medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The condition had been developing over the previous 7 years, with progression observed despite a year of compression and massage therapy. The patient was wheelchair-bound and lacked sensation below the waist due to spina bifida. The enlargement appeared to worsen with time.
medical_history.family_history: Many patients with lipedema have a family history of similarly enlarged legs.
medical_history.social_history: Wheelchair-bound; no other social history specified.
